description: GitHub CLI と open-remote-ssh を使用して Code-OSS/VS Codium から GitHub Codespaces に接続
viewsContainers.openSpaces.title: GitHub Codespaces
views.codespaceTree.name: Codespaces
command.connect.title: Codespace に接続
command.start.title: Codespace を開始
command.stop.title: Codespace を停止
command.refresh.title: Codespaces を更新
command.openAuthTerminal.title: GitHub CLI で認証
command.rebuild.title: Codespace を再構築
command.rebuildFull.title: Codespace を再構築（フル）
command.disconnect.title: Codespace から切断
command.delete.title: Codespace を削除
command.create.title: Codespace を作成
command.openSshTerminal.title: SSH ターミナルを開く
command.addCodespaceScope.title: Add Codespace Scope
command.statusBarActions.title: Codespace Status Bar Actions
command.filterByText.title: Filter Codespaces by Text
command.filterByState.title: Filter Codespaces by State
command.clearFilters.title: Clear Codespace Filters
command.bulkStop.title: Stop Selected Codespaces
command.bulkDelete.title: Delete Selected Codespaces
command.manageTemplates.title: Manage Codespace Templates
command.previewDevcontainer.title: Preview Devcontainer
config.sshConfigPath.description: Path to the SSH config file (default: ~/.ssh/config)
config.pollingInterval.description: Polling interval in milliseconds for transitional state updates (default: 5000)
config.backgroundRefreshInterval.descrip: Background refresh interval in milliseconds when the tree view is visible (default: 60000)
config.sshProbeRetries.description: Number of SSH readiness probe retries before connecting (default: 3)
config.sshProbeDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds between SSH readiness probe attempts (default: 3000)
config.defaultMachineType.description: Default machine type to pre-select when creating codespaces (e.g. 'basicLinux32gb')
config.defaultIdleTimeout.description: Default idle timeout in minutes for new codespaces (0 = use GitHub default)
config.staleThresholdDays.description: Number of days after which an unused codespace is considered stale (default: 14)
config.detectStaleCodespaces.description: Show a notification on startup when stale codespaces are detected (default: true)
config.connectionCheckInterval.descripti: Interval in seconds between connection health checks when inside a codespace (default: 30)
